title: Resume Data
description: Schema for validating resume data. AI instances should infer or generate missing details where applicable.

personal_details.description: Personal information of the individual. AI should create realistic and contextually appropriate details if missing.

first_name.description: First name of the individual. AI can generate a name if missing.

last_name.description: Last name of the individual. AI should generate a surname if missing.

image_url.description: URL of the individual's image. AI should use a placeholder if missing.

nationality.description: Nationality of the individual. AI may infer nationality based on other details.

location.description: Current location of the individual. AI can suggest a location if not provided.

birthday.description: Birth date of the individual. AI may estimate a reasonable date if necessary.

hobbies.description: Hobbies of the individual. AI can suggest hobbies based on the overall profile.

employment_history.description: List of employment experiences. AI should generate plausible job histories if none are provided.

position.description: Job title held in the position. AI may create a title based on industry norms.

years.description: Duration of employment. AI can estimate durations if not specified.

details.description: Details of the job responsibilities and achievements. AI should elaborate if vague.

education.description: Educational background of the individual. AI can fill in typical educational paths if absent.

institution.description: Name of the educational institution. AI can infer or create one if not provided.

qualification.description: Degree or certification obtained. AI can suggest common qualifications for given fields.

date_completed.description: Completion date of the qualification. AI may generate a suitable date if missing.

gpa.description: GPA obtained. AI can provide a realistic GPA based on the education level.

personal_skills.description: List of personal skills. AI should propose skills that align with the individual's profile.

technical_skills.description: List of technical skills relevant to the individualâ€™s profession. AI can suggest skills based on the current job market trends.

contact.description: Contact information of the individual. AI should create fictional but plausible contact details if missing.

phone.description: Phone number. AI may generate a standard format number if not available.

email.description: Email address. AI should create a realistic email address if absent.

website.description: Personal or professional website URL. AI can provide a placeholder URL.

socials.description: Social media profiles. AI may suggest popular social media platforms.

additionalProperties.description: Individual social media URLs. AI can generate plausible URLs.
